onboarding_title_1: We ship for you from any country to Libya
onboarding_subtitle_1: We receive your shipments from any country around the world according to our international branch map and deliver them to Libya safely and quickly
onboarding_title_2: Air and Sea shipping as you need
onboarding_subtitle_2: Fast and economical air shipping and private and shared sea shipping - flexible solutions for individuals and merchants
onboarding_subtitle_3: Clear tracking for every shipment, ready technical support, and easy procedures from start to finish
welcome_message: Welcome to Al Meyar International Shipping App
id_photo_quality_hint: The image must be of clear quality
id_photo_format_hint: The image must be in format (jpg, jpeg, png, pdf)
id_photo_size_hint: The file size must not exceed 2MB.
phone_not_found_error: The entered phone number does not belong to any account
otp_subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to your account phone number
home_search_hint: Search by shipment or trip code
home_request_shipment_desc: Register incoming shipment data for matching
home_track_shipments_desc: Track your shipment moment by moment until arrival
home_shopping_service_desc:
You can buy from any global website without payment complications. Give us the payment link and leave the rest to us.
We guarantee the purchase and pay directly from your wallet.
shipments_addresses_card_desc: Explore our international shipping addresses by shipment type, we cover a wide network of addresses around the world
shipment_details_important_note_desc: Please notify the supplier or delivery company not to leave the parcel in front of the building and to deliver it inside. Also, please review the prohibited materials list before sending the order.
request_shipment_air_desc: The fastest way to ship parcels from all over the world. We offer various deals for express and economy shipping.
request_shipment_air_subtitle: For fast and economy air shipping
request_shipment_sea_desc: The most affordable way to ship goods from all over the world. We offer various deals for shared LCL and private FCL sea shipping.
request_shipment_sea_subtitle: For shared and private sea shipping
